SummaryEnglish: On his planet in the Otherworld, King Kai senses the destruction of the South Galaxy by an unknown Super Saiyan, telepathically contacting Goku upon realizing the that the Milky Way will be targeted next. At that moment, Goku and Chi-Chi (Dragon Ball) are sitting down having an interview at a private school which they hope Gohan (Dragon Ball) will attend, Goku abruptly uses teleportation to reach King Kai's planet and get the entire story.
Aliases: Dragon Ball Z Movie 08 - Broly, The Legendary Super Saiyan
